name: Mining Code Review Repositories
body:
This is the Gerrit code review datasets as part of the Mining Challenge 2016 proposal "Mining Code Review Repositories: People, Process and Product". We extracted all the dataset from Gerrit server using our mining scripts which based on the official REST API. The data is stored as in relational database (MySQL) format. 


### Target Projects
We exported the database objects to self-contained files for each project. All .sql files are available here:
OpenStack : rar , 7z last updated 2015/04/25
LibreOffice :rar, 7z last updated 2015/05/30
AOSP : rar , 7z last updated 2015/04/23
Qt : rar , 7z last updated 2015/04/27
Eclipse : rar , 7z last updated 2015/06/01
All Projects : rar , 7z

### Contributors
Xin Yang, PhD student (NAIST, Japan)
Raula Gaikovina Kula, assistant professor (Osaka University, Japan)
Norihiro Yoshida, associate professor (Nagoya University, Japan)
Hajimu, Iida, professor (NAIST, Japan)
